# MONEY::NETWORK_CASINO_CAN_BET

## Summary
New casino gambling natives.

## Parameters
* **INT** casinogame

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
casinogame must be != 0 - or it will return false. This checks evc availability.
